name: Omer Cheema
title: Software Developer
summary: 5+ years of experience in App and Web Development. Adept at working autonomously as well as collaboratively. Strong ability to multitask under pressure, flexible, and committed to high-quality results.

bullets: Developed Ionic + React app showcasing products from vendors
Built AR-supported apps with React Native, ViroReact, and JavaScript.
Developed Flutter + Unity (C#) with Vuforia; native libs for background tasks.
Version control and releases for App Store / Play Store.
Researched feasibility and integrations for immersive real-time UX.
Resolved IT issues; supported network operations.
Maintained & migrated systems with documentation and backups.

projects.name: UBC Capstone – Award Nomination Portal
projects.desc: Web app for managing award nominations; modeling, UI, testing, client liaison.

projects.name: Data Projection & Project Management
